data.text: @DebraPasquella although we disagree, I really appreciate you being respectful & not attacking. I am truly sorry for the losses of your friends.

@Lisak3388 It’s a shame because I lost two close friends from their second dose of Pfizer—all died of cardiac arrests in their 40’s. This poison is killing people. My own doctor and cardiologist (seen lots of myocarditis) advised against the vax. You do you, but the truth is out now.
@DebraPasquella Pfizer is pure evil. Glad we're on team pure🩸. 😉
@DebraPasquella that's not what this means, it's  a list if things to look out for and is similar to all meds & vaccines
